abstracts.cdata!:
The Agricultural Development Fund
            Project will provide funds to enable ADFI to make loans for
            the development of large commercial farms and for plants for
            packaging, preparation and storage of agricultural products,
            and to pay the foreign exchange cost of an advisor.
